Name: Rhubarb & Honey Bellini
Ingredients: Top up with Fiol Extra Dry Prosecco
Instructions: SHAKE rhubarb syrup and honey liqueur with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with Prosecco and gently stir.
Review: The implausible combination works surprisingly well.
History: A simplified adaptation of a drink created in 2003 by Tony Conigliaro at London's Shumi.
Nutrition: One serving of Rhubarb & Honey Bellini contains 163 calories
